languages.text: "У арбитров не хватает рук для исполнения всех предписанных им обязанностей. С момента прибытия число их, и так ограниченное, продолжает уменьшаться... После некоторого анализа ситуации и в соответствии с уточнением ФС/89З-24 к приказу ОРД-037/ЗН, мы решили обратить ваше внимание на нарушение в уплате десятины, допущенное одним из близлежащих миров. Сия прискорбная оплошность должна быть как можно скорее устранена". {n}Старуха зябко потирает аугментированные ладони, издавая жуткий скрип.{/n}

"The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}
languages.original_text: "У арбитров не хватает рук для исполнения всех предписанных им обязанностей. С момента прибытия число их, и так ограниченное, продолжает уменьшаться... После некоторого анализа ситуации и в соответствии с уточнением ФС/89З-24 к приказу ОРД-037/ЗН, мы решили обратить ваше внимание на нарушение в уплате десятины, допущенное одним из близлежащих миров. Сия прискорбная оплошность должна быть как можно скорее устранена". {n}Старуха зябко потирает аугментированные ладони, издавая жуткий скрип.{/n}

languages.text: « Les arbitrators ne sont pas assez nombreux pour accomplir tous les devoirs qui leur incombent. Depuis leur arrivée dans les Étendues, leurs effectifs, déjà modestes, n'ont cessé de diminuer... Après analyse de la situation et conformément à l'amendement FS/89З-24 du décret ORD-037/ЗN, nous avons décidé de vous informer d'une violation de la dîme commise par l'un des mondes de la région. Un manquement regrettable qu'il convient de rectifier dans les plus brefs délais. » {n}La vieille femme frémit et frotte ses mains augmentées qui émettent un grincement déplaisant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les arbitrators ne sont pas assez nombreux pour accomplir tous les devoirs qui leur incombent. Depuis leur arrivée dans les Étendues, leurs effectifs, déjà modestes, n'ont cessé de diminuer... Après analyse de la situation et conformément à l'amendement FS/89З-24 du décret ORD-037/ЗN, nous avons décidé de vous informer d'une violation de la dîme commise par l'un des mondes de la région. Un manquement regrettable qu'il convient de rectifier dans les plus brefs délais. » {n}La vieille femme frémit et frotte ses mains augmentées qui émettent un grincement déplaisant.{/n}

languages.text: «Los Arbitrator están demasiado faltos de personal para cumplir con todos sus deberes. Desde que llegaron por primera vez a la Extensión, sus ya limitados números no han dejado de bajar... Tras analizar la situación conforme la enmienda FS/89З-24 al decreto ORD-037/ЗN, decidimos notificarle de una violación del diezmo cometida en uno de los mundos de la región. Este lamentable lapso debe rectificarse a la mayor prontitud posible». {n}La anciana se estremece y se frota las manos aumentadas con un crujido inquietante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Los Arbitrator están demasiado faltos de personal para cumplir con todos sus deberes. Desde que llegaron por primera vez a la Extensión, sus ya limitados números no han dejado de bajar... Tras analizar la situación conforme la enmienda FS/89З-24 al decreto ORD-037/ЗN, decidimos notificarle de una violación del diezmo cometida en uno de los mundos de la región. Este lamentable lapso debe rectificarse a la mayor prontitud posible». {n}La anciana se estremece y se frota las manos aumentadas con un crujido inquietante.{/n}

languages.text: “法务官人手不足，无法履行帝国法务部应尽的一切职责。当初法务部抵达科罗努斯扩区时，人手就极为有限。随着时间推移，法务官的数量始终在不断减少……我们分析现状之后决定正式通知您，根据ORD-037/ЗN号法令，FS/89З-24号修正案规定，某个世界发生了什一税违规的事故，这个令人遗憾的错误必须即刻纠正。”{n}老妇人颤抖着，搓着满是植入物的双手，发出了令人焦躁的咯吱声。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “法务官人手不足，无法履行帝国法务部应尽的一切职责。当初法务部抵达科罗努斯扩区时，人手就极为有限。随着时间推移，法务官的数量始终在不断减少……我们分析现状之后决定正式通知您，根据ORD-037/ЗN号法令，FS/89З-24号修正案规定，某个世界发生了什一税违规的事故，这个令人遗憾的错误必须即刻纠正。”{n}老妇人颤抖着，搓着满是植入物的双手，发出了令人焦躁的咯吱声。{/n}

languages.text: "Den Arbitratoren fehlen die Mittel, um alle ihre Pflichten wahrnehmen zu können. Seit ihrer Ankunft in der Ausdehnung ist ihre ohnehin schon geringe Zahl kontinuierlich weiter gesunken ... Nach einer eingehenden Analyse der Situation gemäß Zusatz FS/89З-24 von Dekret ORD-037/ЗN haben wir beschlossen, Euch über einen Zehntverstoß in einer der Welten Eures Hoheitsbereichs zu informieren. Dieser bedauerliche Lapsus muss schnellstmöglich korrigiert werden." {n}Die alte Frau zittert und reibt mit einem unangenehmen Knirschen ihre augmentierten Hände.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}

Nach einer eingehenden Analyse der Situation gemäß Zusatz FS/89З-24 von Dekret ORD-037/ЗN haben wir beschlossen, Euch über einen Zehntverstoß in einer der Welten Eures Hoheitsbereichs zu informieren. Dieser bedauerliche Lapsus muss schnellstmöglich korrigiert werden." {n}Die alte Frau zittert und reibt mit einem unangenehmen Knirschen ihre augmentierten Hände.{/n}

languages.text: 「アービトレイターは人手不足で、期待される仕事のすべてを実施できません。彼らがエクスパンスに最初に到着して以来、もともと限られていた人数は減る一方です…ORD-037/3N令への修正条項FS/893-24に従って状況を分析した結果、私たちは一帯の惑星の一つで行われている租税違反についてあなたに通知することに決定しました。この悔やまれる過ちはできるだけ早くに是正されなければなりません」{n}老女は震えて、驚くようなきしむ音を立ててオーギュメント化された手をこすり合わせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターは人手不足で、期待される仕事のすべてを実施できません。彼らがエクスパンスに最初に到着して以来、もともと限られていた人数は減る一方です…ORD-037/3N令への修正条項FS/893-24に従って状況を分析した結果、私たちは一帯の惑星の一つで行われている租税違反についてあなたに通知することに決定しました。この悔やまれる過ちはできるだけ早くに是正されなければなりません」{n}老女は震えて、驚くようなきしむ音を立ててオーギュメント化された手をこすり合わせる。{/n}

languages.text: "Yargıcılar, kendilerinden beklenen tüm vazifeleri yerine getiremeyecek kadar az sayıda. En başından çok olmayan sayıları, Enginlik'e ilk geldiklerinden beri gitgide azalmayı sürdürdü. ORD-037/3N Sayılı Kararnamenin FS/893-24 Sayılı Eki doğrultusunda durumu inceleyip bölgedeki dünyalardan birinde yaşanan bir aşar ihlali hususunda sizi bilgilendirme kararı aldık. Bu üzücü ihmalin mümkün olan en kısa sürede giderilmesi gerekiyor." {n}Yaşlı kadın titriyor, ogmentli elleri de birbirine sürterek sinir bozan bir gıcırtı çıkarıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Arbitrators are too short-handed to perform all the duties expected of them. Since they first arrived in the Expanse, their numbers, limited from the outset, have only continued to dwindle... After analysing the situation in accordance with Amendment FS/89З-24 to Decree ORD-037/ЗN, we have decided to notify you of a tithe violation committed by one of the worlds in the region. This regrettable lapse must be rectified as quickly as possible." {n}The old woman shivers and rubs her augmented hands together with an unnerving creak.{/n}
